npp-plugins.description: Switcher: a plugin to switch between 'associated' files. Currently it handles switching between asm, inc, cpp, h, cch and ch. Useful when assigned to a hotkey.
npp-plugins.author: f0dder

npp-plugins.description: MIME plugin for Notepad++ implements several main functionnalities defined in MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions).
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: NppConvert is a ASCII<->Hex converter plugin for Notepad++.
npp-plugins.author: Don HO
